import React, { Component } from 'react' import api from '../services/api' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default class Users extends Component { state = { show: false, loader: true, users: [] } async componentDidMount() { const id = localStorage.getItem('@Coliseu') const dados = await api.get(`/auth/company/${id}`) console.log(dados.data.users) this.setState({ users: dados.data.users }) setTimeout(function() { this.setState({ show: true , loader: false }) }.bind(this),1000); } render(){ return (
